sentences.sContent: The Creole language is really various dialects arranged on a continuum.
sentences.sCn: 克里奥 耳语其实是多种方言的一个统一体。

sentences.sContent: All the organisms in an ecosystem are part of an evolutionary continuum.
sentences.sCn: 生态系统中的所有生物都是进化连续体的一个环节。

words.tran: 连续的，持续的；继续的；连绵不断的
连续性；一连串；分镜头剧本

trans.tranCn: [数] 连续统；[经] 连续统一体；闭联集
trans.tranOther: a scale of related things on which each one is only slightly different from the one before
